itunes:title: 30: Overwhelmed Countering Mental Shut-Down, Losing Temper with your Wife, Loyalty to Co-workers vs Ambition
title: 30: Overwhelmed Countering Mental Shut-Down, Losing Temper with your Wife, Loyalty to Co-workers vs Ambition
itunes:author: Jocko DEFCOR Network
itunes:subtitle: 0:00:00 - Opening / Onnit.com/jocko - 0:01:41 - The Aide-de-Camp Position, what it entails, and Jocko's experience. - 0:17:14 - Martial Arts for a wheelchair user. - 0:26:25 - Countering mental shut-down from being overwhelmed. -
itunes:summary:
0:00:00 - Opening / Onnit.com/jocko 0:01:41 - The Aide-de-Camp Position, what it entails, and Jocko's experience. 0:17:14 - Martial Arts for a wheelchair user. 0:26:25 - Countering mental shut-down from being overwhelmed. 0:29:09 - Techniques for NOT losing your temper with your Wife. 0:46:51 - Balancing loyalty to co-workers/team-mates and career promotion 0:57:10 - Are there benefits to Team-building exercises and Retreats? 1:08:47 - Things Jocko regrets, would have done differently, or wishes he learned sooner.

Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/jocko-podcast/exclusive-content
